Okay, she had sex with the teacher, she cheated on her husband...but the way she acts, at least to me, shows that she doesn't love him...or at least, not enough to be loyal. Question is: if she doesn't love him, why even continue with him? Why couldn't she just tell her feelings, that she still loves sensei? Wouldn't it be better than making a fool of him? Fear for "breaking his heart"? She pretty much already shattered it to pieces, he just doesn't know yet.
But then again, this is just a story and even though situations like this can happen in real life...it doesn't change the fact that I still, perhaps uselessly, try to understand what makes someone act as such, what drives such behavior.
Breaks my heart but not my rock hard solid penis :D!
